docs.abstract: Urban Dictionary is increasingly becoming real-time archive for new and slang terms, particularly those that have risen because of web and social media; crowdsourced online dictionary allows anyone to contribute words and definitions, making it anthropologist of Internet, taking pulse of society and capturing cultural moments in real time.

docs.snippet: Oops. The idea lasted about as long as a Snapchat text: the head of AMC Theatres mulled openly about creating texting-friendly movie theaters to appeal to smartphone-addicted youngsters. Two days later, after a backlash on social media, the compan...
docs.lead_paragraph: Oops. The idea lasted about as long as a Snapchat text: the head of AMC Theatres mulled openly about creating texting-friendly movie theaters to appeal to smartphone-addicted youngsters. Two days later, after a backlash on social media, the company says it's leaving the idea on "the cutting room floor."

headline.main: AMC U-Turns; Texting in Theaters Now on 'Cutting Room Floor'
headline.print_headline: AMC U-Turns; Texting in Theaters Now on 'Cutting Room Floor'
